body.head: Authority files
body.p: To each category in the taxonomy corresponds a file in the authority-files repository.
In the Authority-Files repo there are currently a series of files mainly generated from lists which have nothing but a title and an id.
Each of these refers to one value so that they can be enriched with a description which is out of the schema and they can be used for relations and ref as the other Ids.
When reordering the hierarchy of the list, please remember to use the same name you give in the taxonomy.xml file also for the filename and the id.
An example of description inside an authority files
Indeed this authority files for each keyword can also get keywords and all the rest. A special use case is for example that of Art Themes.
To create a new authority file, see the new entry creation page.
